name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.HwF.FullRemission.Applicant
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been approved
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd wedi cael ei gymeradwyo
descriptionEn: The full ${applicationFeeTypeEn} fee of ${applicationFee} will be covered by fee remission. You do not need to make a payment.
descriptionCy: Bydd y ffi ${applicationFeeTypeCy} llawn o ${applicationFee} yn cael ei ddileu. Nid oes angen i chi wneud taliad.
